name: Fruity Custard Sawaiyan Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Fruity Custard Sawaiyan Recipe: Boiled colored vermicelli ¾ cup Milk 3 cup Vanilla custard powder 2 tbsp Sugar ½ cup Mix fruit 1 cup
instructions: Add sugar in milk and boil it. Then dissolve custard in water and add in milk and cook till it gets thick. Now add colored vermicelli and keep custard thin. When it gets cool then add mix fruit and serve.
